channel.title: [Added] New Organisation Identifier: XI-IATI-UDC
channel.description:
The following addition to the [IATI Organisation identifier](http://iatistandard.org/203/codelists/IATIOrganisationIdentifier/) list has been proposed for United Darfur Committees. The [request was reviewed](https://github.com/org-id/register/issues/305) by org-id.guide for the most appropriate identifier, and it was concluded that no alternative organisation identifier is currently available.
**Code:** XI-IATI-UDC **Name:** United Darfur Committees **Description:** United Darfur Committees is a non-governmental and non-profit organization established by committees of seven villages in East Dafur State, Sudan, to solve community conflict and assist the people in need. **URL:** https://twitter.com/UnitedDarfur
If no objection is received this XI-IATI code will be approved and added in a week.

item.title: [Added] New Organisation Identifier: XI-IATI-UDC
item.dc:creator: IATI-techteam
item.description:
The following addition to the IATI Organisation identifier list has been proposed for United Darfur Committees. The request was reviewed by org-id.guide for the most appropriate identifier, and it was concluded that no alternative organisation identifier is currently available.

Code: XI-IATI-UDC
Name: United Darfur Committees
Description: United Darfur Committees is a non-governmental and non-profit organization established by committees of seven villages in East Dafur State, Sudan, to solve community conflict and assist the people in need.
URL: https://twitter.com/UnitedDarfur

If no objection is received this XI-IATI code will be approved and added in a week.
